texts.biography: Sindh, hailing from the realms of Erathia, wields the Bhuj with mastery. Leading Loxodons, he defends with honor and heals with ancient wisdom. As a neutral force, Sindh's legacy shapes the history.
texts.name: Sindh

specialty.name: Loxodon
